form.attributeNameIdHelp: LDAP attribute name holding the username (e.g. uid).
form.attributeNameFullnameHelp: LDAP attribute name for the users displayname (e.g. cn).
form.attributeNameMailHelp: LDAP attribute name for the users e-mail address (e.g. mail).
form.attributeNameGroupHelp: The name of the ldap attribute which contains the group names of the user.
form.connectionDnHelp: The complete dn of the proxy user. Note: This user needs read and search privileges for the id, mail and fullname attributes.
form.hostUrlHelp: The url for the ldap server. For example: ldap://localhost:389/
form.searchFilterHelp: The search filter to find the users. Note: {0} will be replaced by the username.
form.searchFilterGroupHelp: The search filter to find groups of the user. Note: {0} will be replaced by the dn of the user. {1} will be replaced by the username. {2} will be replaced by the email address of the user.
form.searchFilterNestedGroupHelp: The search filter to find nested groups of groups. Note: {0} will be replaced by the dn of the subgroup. {1} will be replaced by the group name (cn).
form.searchScopeHelp: The scope for the user search.
form.unitPeopleHelp: The relative location of the users. For example: ou=People
form.unitGroupHelp: The relative location of the groups. For example: ou=Groups
form.referralStrategyHelp: Strategy to handle ldap referrals. IGNORE: will ignore all referrals. FOLLOW: automatically follow any referrals. THROW: throw a ReferralException for each referral.
form.enableNestedADGroupsHelp: Enable search for nested ActiveDirectory groups. Note: Nested ad groups work only for ActiveDirectory.
form.enableNestedGroupsHelp: Enable search for nested groups. This will result in an increase of ldap searches per user.
form.enableStartTlsHelp: Use StartTLS extension to encrypt the connection to the directory server.
form.removeInvalidCharacters: Replace invalid characters in group names
form.removeInvalidCharactersHelp: Invalid characters in group names like '/', '&', '?' or spaces will be replaces with an underscore ('_').
form.enabledHelp: Enables or disables the ldap authentication.
